title: European Premiere: Jack Garratt – Remnants (Goldfish Remix)
content:
Already one of the breakthrough acts of the year, and a name sure to be there or thereabouts in every tastemakers tips for 2015, Jack Garratt’s rapid rise to fame doesn’t seem to be slowing down anytime soon.

This latest remix comes courtesy of co-songwriter/producer Goldfish (Bastian Langebaek), who originally lent his talents to Garratt’s online smash, Worry. Keeping Jack’s pitch-perfect vocals, and layering them in amongst a kaleidoscope of fluctuating beats, not only is it a fantastic remix in its own right, it’s also perhaps a hint at the sort of direction Garratt himself could go in. Check out Goldfish’s remix of Remnants below, and the original version of Worry.
